TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit FileSystemAclExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class FileSystemAclExtensions abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供特定于 Windows 的静态扩展方法用来操作文件和目录的访问控制列表 (ACL) 安全属性。

span.span: Provides Windows-specific static extension methods for manipulating Access Control List (ACL) security attributes for files and directories.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Create (this System.IO.DirectoryInfo directoryInfo, System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity directorySecurity);
.method public static hidebysig void Create(class System.IO.DirectoryInfo directoryInfo, class System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity directorySecurity) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Sub Create (directoryInfo As DirectoryInfo, directorySecurity As DirectorySecurity)
static member Create : System.IO.DirectoryInfo * System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity -> unit

param.name: directoryInfo
param.span: 一个尚不存在但将通过此方法创建的目录。

span.span: A directory that does not exist yet that will be created by the method.

param.name: directorySecurity
param.span: 目录的访问控制和审核安全。

span.span: The access control and audit security for the directory.

summary.span: 创建一个新目录，确保使用指定的目录安全性创建该目录。

span.span: Creates a new directory, ensuring it is created with the specified directory security.

summary.span: 如果该目录已存在，则不执行任何操作。

span.span: If the directory already exists, nothing is done.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此扩展方法已添加到 .NET Core，以引入由 [DirectoryInfo (system.security.accesscontrol.directorysecurity) ](/dotnet/api/system.io.directoryinfo.create?view=netframework-4.8#System_IO_DirectoryInfo_Create_System_Security_AccessControl_DirectorySecurity_) .NET Framework 方法提供的功能。This extension method was added to .NET Core to bring the functionality that was provided by the [DirectoryInfo.Create(DirectorySecurity)](/dotnet/api/system.io.directoryinfo.create?view=netframework-4.8#System_IO_DirectoryInfo_Create_System_Security_AccessControl_DirectorySecurity_) .NET Framework method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用指定的目录安全属性在用户的临时文件夹内创建一个新目录：The following code example creates a new directory inside the user's temporary folder with the specified directory security attributes: [!code-csharp[DirectoryInfoCreateDirectory](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.FileSystem.AccessControl/DirectoryInfoCreateDirectory.cs)]

span.span: or is .

exception.span: 找不到路径的某一部分。

span.span: Could not find a part of the path.
Access to the path is denied.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.IO.FileStream Create (this System.IO.FileInfo fileInfo, System.IO.FileMode mode, System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights rights, System.IO.FileShare share, int bufferSize, System.IO.FileOptions options, System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity fileSecurity);

.method public static hidebysig class System.IO.FileStream Create(class System.IO.FileInfo fileInfo, valuetype System.IO.FileMode mode, valuetype System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights rights, valuetype System.IO.FileShare share, int32 bufferSize, valuetype System.IO.FileOptions options, class System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity fileSecurity) cil managed

<Extension()> Public Function Create (fileInfo As FileInfo, mode As FileMode, rights As FileSystemRights, share As FileShare, bufferSize As Integer, options As FileOptions, fileSecurity As FileSecurity) As FileStream

static member Create : System.IO.FileInfo * System.IO.FileMode * System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights * System.IO.FileShare * int * System.IO.FileOptions * System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity -> System.IO.FileStream
MemberSignature.Usage: System.IO.FileSystemAclExtensions.Create (fileInfo, mode, rights, share, bufferSize, options, fileSecurity)

param.name: fileInfo
param.span: 一个尚不存在但将通过此方法创建的文件。

span.span: A file that does not exist yet that will be created by the method.

param.name: mode
param.span: 一个枚举值，用于指定操作系统应如何打开文件。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies how the operating system should open a file.

param.name: rights
param.span: 一个枚举值，用于定义在创建访问和审核规则时要使用的访问权限。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that defines the access rights to use when creating access and audit rules.

param.name: share
param.span: 一个枚举值，用于控制其他文件流对象可对同一文件进行哪种类型的访问。

span.span: One of the enumeration values for controlling the kind of access other file stream objects can have to the same file.

param.name: bufferSize
param.span: 用于读取和写入到文件的已放入缓冲区的字节数。

span.span: The number of bytes buffered for reads and writes to the file.

param.name: options
param.span: 一个枚举值，用于描述如何创建或覆盖该文件。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that describes how to create or overwrite the file.

param.name: fileSecurity
param.span: 一个对象，用于确定文件的访问控制和审核安全性。

span.span: An object that determines the access control and audit security for the file.

summary.span: 创建一个新的文件流，确保使用指定的属性和安全设置创建该文件流。

span.span: Creates a new file stream, ensuring it is created with the specified properties and security settings.
A file stream for the newly created file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已将此扩展方法添加到 .NET Core，以引入由提供的功能：This extension method was added to .NET Core to bring the functionality that was provided by: - [FileStream (String、文件、FileSystemRights、文件共享、Int32、、FileSecurity) ](/dotnet/api/system.io.filestream.-ctor?view=netframework-4.8#System_IO_FileStream__ctor_System_String_System_IO_FileMode_System_Security_AccessControl_FileSystemRights_System_IO_FileShare_System_Int32_System_IO_FileOptions_System_Security_AccessControl_FileSecurity_) .NET Framework 构造函数。The [FileStream(String, FileMode, FileSystemRights, FileShare, Int32, FileOptions, FileSecurity)](/dotnet/api/system.io.filestream.-ctor?view=netframework-4.8#System_IO_FileStream__ctor_System_String_System_IO_FileMode_System_Security_AccessControl_FileSystemRights_System_IO_FileShare_System_Int32_System_IO_FileOptions_System_Security_AccessControl_FileSecurity_) .NET Framework constructor. - [文件. Create (String，Int32，文件，FileSecurity](/dotnet/api/system.io.file.create?view=netframework-4.8#System_IO_File_Create_System_String_System_Int32_System_IO_FileOptions_System_Security_AccessControl_FileSecurity_) .NET Framework 方法。The [File.Create(String, Int32, FileOptions, FileSecurity](/dotnet/api/system.io.file.create?view=netframework-4.8#System_IO_File_Create_System_String_System_Int32_System_IO_FileOptions_System_Security_AccessControl_FileSecurity_) .NET Framework method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在用户的临时文件夹中创建一个新的文本文件，并显式指定所有安全特性：The following code example creates a new text file inside the user's temporary folder, explicitly specifying all security attributes: [!code-csharp[FileInfoCreate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.FileSystem.AccessControl/FileInfoCreate.cs)]

param.name: directorySecurity
param.span: 一个对象，用于确定目录的访问控制和审核安全性。

span.span: An object that determines the access control and audit security for the directory.

param.name: path
param.span: 要创建的目录的路径。

span.span: The path of the directory to create.

summary.span: 创建一个目录并返回该目录，确保使用指定的目录安全性创建该目录。

span.span: Creates a directory and returns it, ensuring it is created with the specified directory security.

summary.span: 如果该目录已存在，则返回现有目录。

span.span: If the directory already exists, the existing directory is returned.

returns.span: 表示已创建的目录（包含提供的安全属性）或现有目录的目录信息对象。

span.span: A directory information object representing either a created directory with the provided security properties, or the existing directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此扩展方法已添加到 .NET Core，以引入 .NET Framework 方法提供的功能 `System.IO.Directory.CreateDirectory(System.String,System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity)` 。This extension method was added to .NET Core to bring the functionality that was provided by the `System.IO.Directory.CreateDirectory(System.String,System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity)` .NET Framework method.
